name: Pandemic: The Board Game
description: As a member of an elite disease-fighting team you must find the cure to four deadly diseases before it's too late. Travel the world, contain infections and find the cure to save humanity. Work as a team to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: AMD/Intel 2.0 GHz dual-core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better Storage: 1 GB available space
